Citations.Cited_Guidance: Within a study design, if a planned enrollment number is defined, it must be specified either in the study population or in all cohorts.
Within a study design, if a planned enrollment number is defined, it must be specified either in the study population or in all cohorts.

rule.Description: Within a study design, if a planned enrollment number is defined, it must be specified either in the study population or in all cohorts.

Outcome.Message: A planned enrollment number has been specified for both the study population and the cohorts, or it has been specified for only a subset of the cohorts.
